long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: For ad salespeople: Create Broadstreet ads with ParkAve for sales presentations and then export code for them for platforms like Broadstreet, Google Ad Manager, Advanced Ads for Wordpress, and more. Once installed, simply hover over any ad served from a supported platform and click "ParkAve" in the bottom right corner of the ad to begin.
